        public Tower(int tx,
     int ty,
     int tz,

        This creates a tower representation.
        Parameters:
        tx - x coordinate of the tower
        ty - y coordinate of the tower
        tz - z coordinate of the tower
        ttheta - theta of the tower

      • Tower

        public Tower(int tx,
     int ty,
     int tz,
     int ttheta,
     boolean newTower)
        This creates a tower represention with an already given representation.
        Parameters:
        tx - x coordinate of the tower
        ty - y coordinate of the tower
        tz - z coordinate of the tower
        ttheta - theta of the tower
        newTower - True if old tower is specified to be used
